faq.title: Website creation stages:
faq.description:
A website created by Softwhere is an effective business tool that works 24/7, and we guarantee its proper development and promotion.
It attracts customers to you, increases sales and increases user loyalty.
faq.answer1: In the first stage, you define the goals of your website, content, addresses and prepare the right data. Planning includes making decisions about the structure, design and functions of your site.
faq.answer2: In the second stage, you create the design of your site based on the pre-prepared plan. Here you can develop your brand design, colors, fonts and interface design based on your brand concepts.
faq.answer3: At this stage, code writing begins based on design and functions. Here you will need front-end (client side) and back-end (server logic and data handling) programming.
faq.answer4: In the final stage, the created site is tested and prepared for placement on the Internet. At this stage, it is necessary to conduct all types of tests to detect problems and errors, fix them and present your site to a wide audience.
